titles.title: O God, You Are My God #2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God, You are my God I will seek after You O God, You are my God How I long for You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as the eyes of a servant Look to the hand of His master As the hands of a maid to her mistress So my son looked to you.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God, You are my God I will seek after You O God, You are my God How I long for You. (2x){/lang-eng}
